TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Connection/VideoProvider extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a means of controlling the video session associated with a Connection.

abstract member ChangePeerDimensions : int * int -> unit override this.ChangePeerDimensions : int * int -> unit

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ChangeVideoQuality(valuetype Android.Telecom.VideoQuality videoQuality) cil managed
abstract member ChangeVideoQuality : Android.Telecom.VideoQuality -> unit override this.ChangeVideoQuality : Android.Telecom.VideoQuality -> unit

Docs.param: The updated video quality. Valid values: VideoProfile#QUALITY_HIGH, VideoProfile#QUALITY_MEDIUM, VideoProfile#QUALITY_LOW, VideoProfile#QUALITY_DEFAULT.
Docs.summary: Used to inform listening InCallService implementations when the video quality of the call has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void HandleCallSessionEvent(valuetype Android.Telecom.VideoSessionEvent e) cil managed
abstract member HandleCallSessionEvent : Android.Telecom.VideoSessionEvent -> unit override this.HandleCallSessionEvent : Android.Telecom.VideoSessionEvent -> unit

Docs.param: The event. Valid values are: VideoProvider#SESSION_EVENT_RX_PAUSE, VideoProvider#SESSION_EVENT_RX_RESUME, VideoProvider#SESSION_EVENT_TX_START, VideoProvider#SESSION_EVENT_TX_STOP, VideoProvider#SESSION_EVENT_CAMERA_FAILURE, VideoProvider#SESSION_EVENT_CAMERA_READY, VideoProvider#SESSION_EVENT_CAMERA_FAILURE.
Docs.summary: Used to inform listening InCallService implementations when the VideoProvider reports a call session event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnRequestConnectionDataUsage() cil managed

Docs.summary: Issues a request to the VideoProvider to retrieve the current data usage for the video component of the current Connection.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void OnSendSessionModifyRequest (Android.Telecom.VideoProfile fromProfile, Android.Telecom.VideoProfile toProfile);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSendSessionModifyRequest(class Android.Telecom.VideoProfile fromProfile, class Android.Telecom.VideoProfile toProfile) cil managed
abstract member OnSendSessionModifyRequest : Android.Telecom.VideoProfile * Android.Telecom.VideoProfile -> unit

Docs.param: The video profile prior to the request.
The video profile with the requested changes made.
Docs.summary: Issues a request to modify the properties of the current video session.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSetZoom(float32 value) cil managed

Docs.param: The camera zoom ratio; for the current camera, should be a value in the range defined by android.hardware.camera2.CameraCharacteristics#CONTROL_ZOOM_RATIO_RANGE.
Docs.summary: Sets the camera zoom ratio.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReceiveSessionModifyRequest(class Android.Telecom.VideoProfile videoProfile) cil managed
abstract member ReceiveSessionModifyRequest : Android.Telecom.VideoProfile -> unit override this.ReceiveSessionModifyRequest : Android.Telecom.VideoProfile -> unit

Docs.summary: Used to inform listening InCallService implementations when the VideoProvider receives a session modification request.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void ReceiveSessionModifyResponse (Android.Telecom.ModifyRequestResult status, Android.Telecom.VideoProfile requestedProfile, Android.Telecom.VideoProfile responseProfile);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReceiveSessionModifyResponse(valuetype Android.Telecom.ModifyRequestResult status, class Android.Telecom.VideoProfile requestedProfile, class Android.Telecom.VideoProfile responseProfile) cil managed

abstract member ReceiveSessionModifyResponse : Android.Telecom.ModifyRequestResult * Android.Telecom.VideoProfile * Android.Telecom.VideoProfile -> unit override this.ReceiveSessionModifyResponse : Android.Telecom.ModifyRequestResult * Android.Telecom.VideoProfile * Android.Telecom.VideoProfile -> unit

Docs.param: Status of the session modify request. Valid values are VideoProvider#SESSION_MODIFY_REQUEST_SUCCESS, VideoProvider#SESSION_MODIFY_REQUEST_FAIL, VideoProvider#SESSION_MODIFY_REQUEST_INVALID, VideoProvider#SESSION_MODIFY_REQUEST_TIMED_OUT, VideoProvider#SESSION_MODIFY_REQUEST_REJECTED_BY_REMOTE
The original request which was sent to the peer device.
The actual profile changes agreed to by the peer device.
Docs.summary: Used to inform listening InCallService implementations when the VideoProvider receives a response to a session modification request.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetCallDataUsage(int64 dataUsage) cil managed
abstract member SetCallDataUsage : int64 -> unit override this.SetCallDataUsage : int64 -> unit

Docs.param: The updated data usage (in bytes). Reported as the cumulative bytes used since the start of the call.
Docs.summary: Used to inform listening InCallService implementations when the data usage of the video associated with the current Connection has changed.
